title: Apple exports iPhone 6 Plus and iPad 4 to vintage list, limiting service options
content:
Farewell iPhone 6 Plus, we hardly knew thee. Only seven years after Apple released that iteration of its smartphone, the tech has been sufficiently dated by successors – and time – for the iPhone 6 Plus to be rendered to the company’s list of vintage products this week.

more…

The post Apple exports iPhone 6 Plus and iPad 4 to vintage list, limiting service options  appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple adds its best-selling iPhone 6 Plus to its vintage list of obsolete products, along with iPad 4 and late 2012 Mac Mini.
